issue.title: [CF 1569] Can I cast spell on icon click?
issue.body:
Hello. Can you please tell me if i can click tmw icon to cast spell? I tried "Notifications" -> "Lua" -> "On left click", but I wasn't able to figure out how to cast something, because CastSpell, CastSpellByName and even RunMacroText are protected and cannot be used. Do you have any idea?


> Posted by CurseForge user reks6000 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1569 | Raw

comments.body:
No, you can't.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
